title: Cant redownload LoL because the website is unavailable
body: This website is unavailable for me so I can't redownload the LoL client, Im having to reinstall because I was getting and "Unspecified Error, please check logs for more information".

replies.body: http://www.mediafire.com/download/ilx99eik8bmi7cx/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe
